name: Rocket Game (SweetMouseGames)
description:
Inputs:

Space to thrust

A and D to turn the rocket

Fly the rocket to the other platform. Normally the next level should load but for now . just sound and particle effects will appear and the current level will restart.

This is the first level of a game I created in a Unity course.   Rocket and the other assets, as the platforms, the barrier and the gear I created myself in Blender.
